![NYC 311](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/global/ico-311-51x51.png)

# HOW CAN WE HELP YOU?

Report Problems

Look Up Service Requests

Make Payments

## NYC Today

## Most Popular

![Benefits & Support](/benefits.jpg )

### Benefits & Support

Affordable housing, homelessness, SNAP (food stamps), cash assistance, child care, volunteering, donating.

![Businesses & Consumers](/businessesconsumers.jpg )

### Businesses & Consumers

Starting and running a business, licenses, permits, government contracts, consumer protection.

![Courts & Law](/courtslaw.jpg )

### Courts & Law

Jails, incarcerated people, tickets, legal cases and assistance, jury duty, marriage, domestic partnership.

![Culture & Recreation](/culture.jpg )

### Culture & Recreation

Parks, park maintenance, places to go and things to do for visitors and locals.

![Education](/education.jpg )

### Education

Schools and learning opportunities for all ages.

![Employment](/employment1.jpg )

### Employment

Jobs, training, worker protection and support.

![Environment](/environment1.jpg )

### Environment

Water and air quality, odors, environmental protection.

![Government & Elections](/governmentelections.jpg )

### Government & Elections

Service Request status, Agency feedback and performance, elected officials, data, voter information.

![Health](/health.jpg )

### Health

Insurance, care, healthy living, violations.

![Housing & Buildings](/housingbuildings.jpg )

### Housing & Buildings

Housing options, building and property maintenance, construction.

![Noise](/noise.jpg )

### Noise

Rules and reports of noisy neighbors, vehicles, dogs, and more.

![Pets, Pests & Wildlife](/petspestswildlife.JPG )

### Pets, Pests & Wildlife

Licenses, lost and found, rats, mice, bed bugs.

![Public Safety](/publicsafety.jpg )

### Public Safety

Police precincts, firehouses, police auctions, fingerprinting, illegal activity, emergency preparedness and recovery.

![Records](/records1.jpg )

### Records

ID, birth, death, marriage, property, health, school, fire and police reports, City documents.

![Sidewalks, Streets & Highways](/sidewalks_streets_highways.jpg )

### Sidewalks, Streets & Highways

Maintenance, violations, closures, bridges, tunnels.

![Taxes](/taxes.jpg )

### Taxes

Preparation, exemptions.

![Transportation](/transport.jpg )

### Transportation

Tickets, tows, driving, parking, public transportation, taxis, airports, bikes, accessibility.

![Trash & Recycling](/garbagerecycling.jpg )

### Trash & Recycling

Disposal, collection, street cleaning, sanitation violations, illegal dumping.

![A to Z](/atoz.jpg)

### A to Z

Everything in alphabetical order.

![NYC 311 Logo](/nyc311-logo.png)

## More on NYC.gov

![NYC Logo](https://www1.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/global/nyc_white@x2.png)

To change the text size on NYC.gov you can use your web browser's settings. Most browsers include functionality to let you increase or decrease the text on a web page. For example, to increase text size using:

#### Chrome

In the menu to the right of the address bar, select and set Zoom level. Menu > Zoom > +

#### Firefox

In the View menu, select Zoom. View > Zoom > Zoom In

#### Internet Explorer

In the View menu, select Text Size. View > Text Size > Largest

#### Safari

In the View menu, select Zoom In. View > Zoom In  
Macintosh Shortcut: Command+

#### No Web Browser Endorsement

Common browsers are included in this page; mention of a specific browser does not imply endorsement or recommendation.
